attributes.action: ensure that a balance is struck in the education of the children of the UK, by sending each school a copy of Channel 4's "Global warming swindle" as an oposing view to "An inconvenient truth"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite the spin by the government "The science" of Global warming is neither conclusive nor a concensus .

The Orwellian indoctrination of children is morally wrong.

The suppression of opposing views to the man made global warming theory is a suppression of free speech and stifles a true debate about the true situation.

Let the debate become public and open and be based on facts not vested interests.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
